Package org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1

Interface Summary
Connection  
ResponseHandler<T> Handles responses from Web Service calls
 

Class Summary
AgentApi The Hyperic HQ Agent API.
AlertApi The Hyperic HQ Alert API.
AlertDefinitionApi The Hyperic HQ Alert Definition API.
AlertDefinitionBuilder This class is used to create AlertConditions.
ApplicationApi The Hyperic HQ Application API.
AutodiscoveryApi The Hyperic HQ Autodiscovery API.
ControlApi The Hyperic HQ Control API.
EscalationActionBuilder Utility class to build EscalationActions.
EscalationApi The Hyperic HQ Escalation API.
EventApi The Hyperic HQ Event API.
FileResponseHandler<T> Implementation of ResponseHandler responsible for retrieving the contents of a file from the method response, writing to the local filesystem, and returning a status response of a given type
GroupApi The Hyperic HQ Group API.
HQApi The Hyperic HQ API.
MaintenanceApi The Hyperic HQ Maintenance API.
MetricApi The Hyperic HQ Metric API.
MetricDataApi The Hyperic HQ MetricData API.
ResourceApi The Hyperic HQ Resource API.
ResourceEdgeApi The Hyperic HQ Resource Edge API.
RoleApi The Hyperic HQ Role API.
ServerConfigApi The Hyperic HQ Server Configuration API.
UserApi The Hyperic HQ User API.
XmlResponseHandler<T> Implementation of ResponseHandler that uses JAXB to convert a method response body from XML to a java response object of a specified type
XmlUtil Utility class to convert Java objects to XML and vice versa.
 

Enum Summary
AlertDefinitionBuilder.AlertBaseline Indicates the type of Baseline condition to create.
AlertDefinitionBuilder.AlertComparator Comparator used with AlertConditions that use thresholds.
AlertDefinitionBuilder.AlertConditionType The AlertCondition type.
AlertDefinitionBuilder.AlertControlStatus Indicates the control status to check.
AlertDefinitionBuilder.AlertLogLevel Indicates the event log level to check.
AlertDefinitionBuilder.AlertPriority The AlertDefinition priority.
